decision_conditions: The requested non-material amendment to planning permission P1585.22 dated 16/01/2024 to allow for increasing the hours of operation of the restaurant / cafÃ?© operation beyond 11pm or before 7am with respect to staff activities (cleaning, tidying, disposing waste, or coming and goings) would be considered to have a material impact upon the amenities of the noise sensitive uses and cannot be regarded as a minor amendment.
The submission of a fresh planning application is therefore deemed necessary in this case.
description: Application for a non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1585.22 dated 16/01/2024 to allow amendment in wording of condition 21 (Demolition of all buildings and redevelopment to provide a hotel (within Use Class C1) at ground floor and part three and part four storeys over; together with premises at ground floor for the display or retail sale of goods, other than hot food (Use Class E(a)); and/or for the sale of food and drink for consumption (mostly) on the premises (Use Class E(b)), and/or for the provision of financial services, professional services or other appropriate services in a commercial, business or service locality (Use Class E(c)).)
